A

About_ActionListener - Class in View
Methods for working with about menutitem.
About_ActionListener(String, String, String, String) - Constructor for class View.About_ActionListener
 
actionPerformed(ActionEvent) - Method in class View.About_ActionListener
Shows the information about this project in popup window when pressing the about menuitem.
actionPerformed(ActionEvent) - Method in class View.Connect_ActionListener
Opens a new window to enter the ip of the phone when pressing the connect menutitem.
actionPerformed(ActionEvent) - Method in class View.Language_ActionListener
Opens a window where you can select your preferred language in a combobox when pressing the language menuitem.
actionPerformed(ActionEvent) - Method in class View.language_ok_button_ActionListener
Closes the window where you can select the language and writes the selected language in language.txt when pressing the ok button in language window.
actionPerformed(ActionEvent) - Method in class View.Light_ActionListener
After the button was pressed, the change Event shell start.
actionPerformed(ActionEvent) - Method in class View.Map_ActionListener
This method will open the default browser of your computer and show the coordinates on google maps.
actionPerformed(ActionEvent) - Method in class View.Quit_ActionListener
Before the whole programm is closed by "system.exit" it is important to save the log and *.gpx-file by their own method.
actionPerformed(ActionEvent) - Method in class View.Record_ActionListener
If you want to start or stop a record, you need to send the right signal to your Android device.
actionPerformed(ActionEvent) - Method in class View.Resolution_ActionListener
With the index of a "JComboBox" you can change your resolution of the camera to certain one.
actionPerformed(ActionEvent) - Method in class View.Signal_ActionListener
With the help of this event you would be able to signal someone that your car is on the way or maybe pay attention to it.
actionPerformed(ActionEvent) - Method in class View.SwitchCameraType_ActionListener
It enables the chosen camera (front or back).
angle_slider - Variable in class View.GUI_Computer
